title: कर्नाटक भाजपा सांसद का दावा: गौ तस्करों ने की युवक की हत्या, पोस्टमार्डम में आत्महत्या की पुष्टि
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: 19 year old young Gau Rakshak Shivu Uppar ( Karnataka)was hacked to death and hanged in bhagewadi bus stand his only crime was to prevent cattle robbery by cattle smugglers we will not sit quite until action will be not taken..@Tejasvi_Suryapic.twitter.com/GH2YUAjrnV
